price: 5. Alobi: Nkolo! Ya sólo, natei bato na ngai butu na moyi,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
